snippet.title: Daydream: Forgotten Sorrow - Official Launch Trailer
snippet.description:
Daydream: Forgotten Sorrow is finally out now: https://ravenage.ink/3G0S8tL

Daydream: Forgotten Sorrow is an atmospheric puzzle platformer game starring Griffin, a little boy who struggles to face his fears. Thankfully, his teddy bear companion Birly is always by his side.

You'll journey through a world unlike any other, filled with stunning landscapes and intriguing secrets waiting to be uncovered. With its charming visuals and captivating storyline, this game is sure to leave you entranced from start to finish.

But the true magic of Daydream: Forgotten Sorrow lies in its puzzles. Each level will challenge you to think outside the box and use your problem-solving skills to overcome obstacles and unlock the game's deepest secrets. With each new puzzle, you'll feel a sense of accomplishment as you inch closer to uncovering the mysteries of this enchanting world.

Find Daydream: Forgotten Sorrow on social media:

► Twitter: https://twitter.com/day_dream_game
► Discord: https://discord.gg/zap9pZ4k8k
► TikTok: https://www.tiktok.com/@daydreamgame
